title: One Piece's Most Hated Story Was Actually Ruined By The Anime
author: ScreenRant Staff
description: Analysis of how the anime's filler additions to the Long Ring Long Land arc, including episodes like 216, significantly damaged the arc's reputation by extending three manga games into six anime games.
spoilerScope: Covers the entire Long Ring Long Land arc but focuses on pre-Water 7 content

title: One Piece's Most Hated Arc Is Actually The Most Important
author: ScreenRant Staff
description: Article arguing that despite its poor reception, the Long Ring Long Land arc has been vindicated by recent manga developments connecting to Rocks D. Xebec and the Davy Back Fight's historical significance.
spoilerScope: Contains spoilers up to recent manga chapters (2024-2025)

title: One Piece: Why Long Ring Long Land Arc May Be One Of The Most Important Arcs Yet
author: GameRant Staff
description: Explores theories about why the seemingly inconsequential Long Ring Long Land arc may have major implications for the series finale, including potential Davy Back Fight callbacks.
spoilerScope: Discusses potential future plot developments and recent manga revelations

title: One Piece's Ending May Have Been Set Up By Its Most Unconventional Arc
author: CBR Staff
description: Analyzes how the Long Ring Long Land arc may be foreshadowing for the series ending, particularly the theory about a final Davy Back Fight between Luffy and Shanks.
spoilerScope: Speculates about series ending and future plot developments

title: One Piece Prediction: The Straw Hats Will Face Shanks in a Davy Back Fight
author: CBR Staff
description: Detailed theory article proposing that Luffy and Shanks will engage in a Davy Back Fight rather than traditional combat, making the Long Ring Long Land arc crucial setup.
spoilerScope: Heavy speculation about future plot developments

title: One Piece: 5 Reasons Fans Hate The Long Ring Long Land Arc (& 5 Why It's Actually Great)
author: CBR Staff
description: Balanced analysis presenting both criticisms and defenses of the Long Ring Long Land arc, including discussion of the anime's filler episodes.
spoilerScope: Focuses on the arc itself without major future spoilers

title: In Defense of the Davy Back Fight Arc
author: CBR Staff
description: Article defending the Davy Back Fight arc against common criticisms, arguing for its thematic importance and character development value.

title: 25 Years Later, Eiichiro Oda Is Making One Piece's Most Disliked Arc Relevant Again
author: FandomWire Staff
description: Discusses how recent One Piece manga chapters have vindicated the Long Ring Long Land arc by connecting it to major lore revelations about Rocks D. Xebec.
spoilerScope: Contains heavy manga spoilers from 2024 chapters

title: One Piece: Long Ring Long Land Arc Summary, Recap & Review
author: Poggers Editorial Team
description: Comprehensive recap and review of the entire Long Ring Long Land arc, including analysis of the anime's filler episodes like episode 216.

title: 215-216: "Screaming-Hot Bombardment! Pirate Dodgeball!" and "Showdown on the Cliff! Red Light, Green Light!"
author: neverwatchedonepiece
description: Recap and commentary on episodes 215-216 from a first-time One Piece watcher, providing fresh perspective on the filler episodes and expressing frustration with the Straw Hats' strategic decisions.

title: Episode 216 - One Piece Wiki
author: One Piece Wiki Contributors
description: Comprehensive wiki page for Episode 216 with production details, plot summary, and trivia.

title: Long Ring Long Land Arc - One Piece Wiki
author: One Piece Wiki Contributors
description: Complete wiki page for the Long Ring Long Land arc with detailed information about all episodes, including the anime filler games.
